title: "arrogant & rabbit"
stories: the rabbit lives & the lion dies"

title: "grateful animals
stories: "listen to sound advice no matter who gives it"

title: "blue jackal"
moral: "leave friends to cultivate strangers at your peril"

title: "gullible camel"
moral: marriage & friendship thrives among equals, but not among rich & poor

title: "lion & carpenter"
moral: king with false advisors can bring harm to subjects

title: "turtle & two g&ers"
moral: "It is best to take advice from true friends"

title: "forethought
column7: ready wit win; accepting fate loses"

title: "jackal who tricked lion"
moral: "I must look out for my own interests in secret "

title: "girl who married a snake"
moral: There are 3 things in this world that once given, cannot be withdrawn

title: "unteachable monkey"
moral: Advice & education are wasted on those too stupid to learn

title: "cure & disease"
moral: "cure can be worse than the disease"

title: "mice that ate iron"
stories: the hawk can lift an elephant"

title: "twin parrots
stories: "even brothers can become examples of good & bad education"

title: "sensible foe"
stories: the noble serve others even at their own expense"

title: "foolish friend"
moral: "beware of making friends with fools & trusting them too much"
